name: Dungeon of the DEAD (Robertm1996)
description:
- Game Dev TV 2022 Game Jam - TIME ALLOWED: 10 days - THEME: Death is just the beggining. - TEAM SIZE: Solo - OS: Windows -

Fight, shoot and survive your way through as many rounds as possible. Managing different currency to upgrade and restock.

Feeling brave? 

Discover the many easter eggs around the map and learn some secrets about the developer.

Link to source can be found above or directly in dropbox here for 30 days --> 

https://www.dropbox.com/s/fz8yjv3jfzi22ce/DungeonOfTheDead.zip?dl=0

Any issues please contact me direct - Robertm1996@outlook.com
